thread.title: 10Best Readers' Choice: Amusement park winners announced!
thread.title_full: 10Best Readers' Choice: Amusement park winners announced!

author: 10Best Editors, USA TODAY 10Best
title: 10Best Readers' Choice: Amusement park winners announced!
text:
Check out which amusement parks took top honors in the 10Best Readers' Choice awards. (Photo: Digital Vision., Getty Images)
2 CONNECT 6 TWEET LINKEDIN COMMENT EMAIL MORE USA TODAY 10Best teamed up with a panel of amusement park bloggers to select 20 nominees in each of the categories of Best Roller-Coaster, Best Non-Roller Coaster Ride, Best New Amusement Park Attraction, Best Amusement Park Entertainment and Best Amusement Park Restaurant. Our readers have been voting for their favorites for the past four weeks, and now the results are in.
The craziest coaster and most mouth-watering park eatery are among 10Best.com's highly rated theme parks.
The winners in each category are as follows:
Best Roller Coaster
Bizarro at Six Flags New England won the title of Best Roller Coaster in the 10Best Readers' Choice awards. (Photo: Massachusetts Office of Travel & Tourism)
Bizarro - Six Flags New England Outlaw Run - Silver Dollar City Maverick - Cedar Point Boulder Dash - Lake Compounce The Voyage - Holiday World Fury 325 - Carowinds Apollo's Chariot - Busch Gardens Williamsburg Manta - SeaWorld Orlando El Toro - Six Flags Great Adventure Banshee - Kings Island Best Non-Roller Coaster Ride After more than 20 years of operation, Twilight Zone Tower of Terror is still America's favorite non-roller coaster ride. (Photo: Walt Disney World Resort)
Twilight Zone Tower of Terror - Disney's Hollywood Studios Harry Potter and the Forbidden Journey - Universal's Islands of Adventure Soarin' - Disney California Adventure & Epcot Harry Potter and the Escape from Gringotts - Universal Studios Florida Amazing Adventures of Spider-Man - Universal's Islands of Adventure Haunted Mansion - Disneyland & Magic Kingdom Jurassic Park: The Ride & River Adventure - Universal Studios Hollywood & Islands of Adventure Timber Mountain Log Ride - Knott's Berry Farm Splash Mountain - Disneyland & Magic Kingdom Pirates of the Caribbean - Disneyland & Magic Kingdom Best New Amusement Park Attraction 10Best readers chose Wicked Cyclone at Six Flags New England as the best new amusement park attraction of 2015. (Photo: Six Flags New England)
Wicked Cyclone - Six Flags New England Impulse - Knoebels Thomas Land - Edaville Thunderbird - Holiday World JUSTICE LEAGUE: Battle for Metropolis - Six Flags Over Texas & Six Flags St. Louis Tempesto - Busch Gardens Williamsburg Laff Trakk - Hersheypark Fireman's Landing - Silver Dollar City Switchback - ZDT's Amusement Park Cannibal - Lagoon Best Amusement Park Entertainment Celtic Fyre at Busch Gardens Williamsburg, winner of Best Amusement Park Entertainment, celebrates Celtic culture and tradition. (Photo: Busch Gardens Williamsburg)
Celtic Fyre - Busch Gardens Williamsburg Disney's Aladdin - A Musical Spectacular - Disney California Adventure Festival of the Lion King - Disney's Animal Kingdom Finding Nemo - The Musical - Disney's Animal Kingdom Iceploration - Busch Gardens Tampa Fantasmic! - Disneyland Park & Disney's Hollywood Studios WaterWorld - Universal Studios Hollywood Horror Make-Up Show - Universal Studios Florida Beauty and the Beast-Live on Stage - Disney's Hollywood Studios Paint the Night - Disneyland Best Amusement Park Restaurant Diagon Alley at Universal Orlando Resort is home to The Leaky Cauldron, just named the Best Amusement Park Restaurant in the 10Best Readers' Choice awards. (Photo: 2014 Universal Orlando Resort. All rights reserved.)
Leaky Cauldron - Universal Studios Florida The Cowfish - Universal CityWalk Mythos Restaurant - Universal's Islands of Adventure Das Festhaus - Busch Gardens Williamsburg Aunt Granny's All-You-Care-to-Eat Buffet - Dollywood Hungry Dutchman Caf√© - Nelis' Dutch Village Vivo Italian Kitchen - Universal CityWalk Be Our Guest Restaurant - Magic Kingdom Blue Bayou Restaurant - Disneyland Mrs. Knott's Chicken Dinner Restaurant - Knott's Berry Farm Congratulations to all the winners! Click here to cast your vote in other Readers' Choice categories.
